title: Empowering Street-Connected Children Through Education
excerpt: Learn how ECN is transforming the lives of street-connected children through the Nairobi Street School initiative.
content: ECN’s Nairobi Street School provides safe learning environments for children in street situations, promoting inclusion and empowerment through innovative education.

title: Community Action for a Healthier Tomorrow
excerpt: Discover how our health awareness programs are improving community well-being across Kenya.
content: Our community health initiatives address pressing local needs — from malaria prevention to hygiene education — fostering stronger, healthier families.

title: Advocating for Every Child’s Right to Learn
excerpt: ECN continues to champion child rights through policy advocacy and community engagement.
content: Through consistent advocacy, ECN collaborates with county leaders to influence education and child protection policies, ensuring every child gets a fair chance to learn.
